BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ALLOWED USERS [ids of user or supergroup] seperate by spaces

EDIT_SLEEP_TIME_OUT.description: Time to wait before edit message

FORCE_DOCUMENTS.description: Should force evething uploaded into Document

COMPLETED_STR.description: Character to use as a completed progress

REMAINING_STR.description: Character to use as a incomplete progress

RCLONE_ENABLED.description: Will be enabled once its set

OWNER_ID.description: Used to restrict use of certain stuff to owner only.
